user_query: I am planning a trip to South Korea next month and I need to know the scheduled departing flights growth for that week. Can you provide me with the weekly growth data for South Korea? Additionally, I would like to know the scheduled departing flights level for Spain during the same week.

TaskList.description: Query the scheduled departing flights growth data for South Korea for the specified week.
Query the scheduled departing flights level for Spain for the same specified week.
